meanings.sent1: The old, frowsiest blanket was the softest.
meanings.sent2: She wore her frowsiest sweater on the chilly evening.
meanings.sent3: The frowsiest pillow in the house always made him sneeze.
meanings.sent4: The frowsiest corner of the attic held hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The frowsiest teddy bear became his favorite cuddle buddy.

meanings.definition: Frowsiest: having a musty or unpleasant smell
meanings.sent1: The basement had the frowsiest odor after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house had the frowsiest scent lingering in the air.
meanings.sent3: The frowsiest socks in his drawer made him wrinkle his nose.
meanings.sent4: The frowsiest books in the library were left untouched for years.
meanings.sent5: The frowsiest cheese in the fridge was quickly thrown away.

meanings.definition: Frowsiest: untidy or unkempt in appearance
meanings.sent1: Her hair was the frowsiest after a long day at the park.
meanings.sent2: The frowsiest room in the house desperately needed cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The frowsiest cat in the neighborhood always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The frowsiest garden on the block was surprisingly full of life.
meanings.sent5: The frowsiest student in class turned out to be the most creative.
